Panel.html:p: We welcome you to this forum where you can share your opinion, unresolved complaint, query and feedback directly with our seniorleaders, steering this special channel. The senior leaders who are a part of this forum are:

html:div.html:p: Our endeavor is to deliver “uninterrupted power supply” to all the customers.It will be heartening to know your experiences or suggestions to help us get better. Please feel free to provide us your valuable feedback or suggestions. We are committed to serving our customers to the best of our ability.

I acknowledge that you have a choice of a service provider.I can assure you that we are committed to serving our customers seamlessly.However, in case your experience is otherwise or you have suggestion for us to serve you better, kindly write to me, directly. I will always cherish your feedback, suggestion or inputs for improvements. Please accept my thanks and gratitude for visiting our web-link and spending your valuable time in engaging with us.

Panel.html:p: Please feel free to write to them. We are committed to address all your concerns to your fullest
satisfaction and put your feedback into action.
For any requests/complaints pertaining to Tata Power Delhi Distribution Ltd (TPDDL), the consumers may please mark their mail to ccag@tatapower-ddl.com
OR at TPDDL website with link http://www.tatapower-ddl.com/ to enable timely resolution.
TPDDL has an independent Complaint Management Process to ensure complaint resolution in line with regulations and customer satisfaction.
